if.test: jdh != null and jdh != '' and orgJgid != '01000000'

mapper.sql: t.jzid jzid, t.jzmc jzmc, t.jzlx jzlx, t.jzwz jzwz, t.lon lon, t.lat lat, t.xqxclx xqxclx, t.yjddsc yjddsc, t.delete_flag deleteFlag, t.datasource datasource, t.bz bz, t.jdh jdh, TO_CHAR(t.sjc,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss') sjc, t.reserve1 reserve1, t.reserve2 reserve2, t.reserve3 reserve3, TO_CHAR(t.reserve4,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss') reserve4, t.cjrid cjrid, t.cjrmc cjrmc, TO_CHAR(t.cjsj,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss') cjsj, t.xgrid xgrid, t.xgrmc xgrmc, TO_CHAR(t.xgsj,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss') xgsj

t_jzl.uuid jzl_uuid, t_jzl.jzid jzl_jzid, t_jzl.jzqk jzl_jzqk, t_jzl.jzsyxz jzl_jzsyxz, t_jzl.jzjg jzl_jzjg, t_jzl.gnms jzl_gnms, t_jzl.zdmj jzl_zdmj, t_jzl.jzmj jzl_jzmj, t_jzl.dsgd jzl_dsgd, t_jzl.dxgd jzl_dxgd, t_jzl.dscs jzl_dscs, t_jzl.dxcs jzl_dxcs, t_jzl.delete_flag jzl_deleteFlag, t_jzl.datasource jzl_datasource, t_jzl.jdh jzl_jdh, TO_CHAR(t_jzl.sjc,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss') jzl_sjc, t_jzl.reserve1 jzl_reserve1, t_jzl.reserve2 jzl_reserve2, t_jzl.reserve3 jzl_reserve3, TO_CHAR(t_jzl.reserve4,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss') jzl_reserve4

t_zzl.uuid zzl_uuid, t_zzl.jzid zzl_jzid, t_zzl.jzjg zzl_jzjg, t_zzl.zdmj zzl_zdmj, t_zzl.zzzc zzl_zzzc, t_zzl.zzgd zzl_zzgd, t_zzl.jsfzr zzl_jsfzr, t_zzl.jsfzrdh zzl_jsfzrdh, t_zzl.ylxx zzl_ylxx, t_zzl.cwxx zzl_cwxx, t_zzl.gylc zzl_gylc, t_zzl.delete_flag zzl_deleteFlag, t_zzl.datasource zzl_datasource, t_zzl.jdh zzl_jdh, TO_CHAR(t_zzl.sjc,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss') zzl_sjc, t_zzl.reserve1 zzl_reserve1, t_zzl.reserve2 zzl_reserve2, t_zzl.reserve3 zzl_reserve3, TO_CHAR(t_zzl.reserve4,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss') zzl_reserve4

t_cgl.uuid cgl_uuid, t_cgl.jzid cgl_jzid, t_cgl.zrj cgl_zrj, t_cgl.cgsl cgl_cgsl, t_cgl.cgjg cgl_cgjg, t_cgl.ccjzms cgl_ccjzms, t_cgl.jsfzr cgl_jsfzr, t_cgl.jsfzrdh cgl_jsfzrdh, t_cgl.plqkd cgl_plqkd, t_cgl.plqkn cgl_plqkn, t_cgl.plqkx cgl_plqkx, t_cgl.plqkb cgl_plqkb, t_cgl.delete_flag cgl_deleteFlag, t_cgl.datasource cgl_datasource, t_cgl.jdh cgl_jdh, TO_CHAR(t_cgl.sjc,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss') cgl_sjc, t_cgl.reserve1 cgl_reserve1, t_cgl.reserve2 cgl_reserve2, t_cgl.reserve3 cgl_reserve3, TO_CHAR(t_cgl.reserve4,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss') cgl_reserve4
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(0) AS NUM FROM YAGL_DWJZXX t WHERE 1=1 AND DELETE_FLAG = 'N'

SELECT , c2.code_name jzlxmc FROM YAGL_DWJZXX t
Left Join SYS_CODELIST c1 on c1.CODETYPE = 'JZLX' And c1.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' Left Join SYS_CODELIST_DETAIL c2 On c1.CODEID = c2.CODEID And c2.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' and t.jzlx = c2.CODE_VALUE WHERE t.DELETE_FLAG = 'N'
ORDER BY NVL(xgsj,cjsj) DESC

SELECT , c2.code_name jzlxmc FROM YAGL_DWJZXX t
Left Join SYS_CODELIST c1 on c1.CODETYPE = 'JZLX' And c1.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' Left Join SYS_CODELIST_DETAIL c2 On c1.CODEID = c2.CODEID And c2.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' and t.jzlx = c2.CODE_VALUE WHERE t.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' AND t.JZID = #{jzid}
mapper.insert:
SELECT SYS_GUID() AS jzid FROM DUAL
INSERT INTO YAGL_DWJZXX(jzid,jzmc,jzlx,jzwz,lon,lat,xqxclx,yjddsc,delete_flag,datasource,bz,jdh,sjc,reserve1,reserve2,reserve3,reserve4,cjrid,cjrmc,cjsj,xgrid,xgrmc,xgsj) VALUES(#{jzid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{jzmc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{jzlx,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{jzwz,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{lon,jdbcType=DOUBLE},#{lat,jdbcType=DOUBLE},#{xqxclx,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{yjddsc,jdbcType=DOUBLE},'N',#{datasource,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{bz,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{jdh,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{sjc,jdbcType=DATE},#{reserve1,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{reserve2,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{reserve3,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{reserve4,jdbcType=DATE},#{cjrid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{cjrmc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},sysdate,#{xgrid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{xgrmc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{xgsj,jdbcType=DATE})

SELECT SYS_GUID() AS jzl_uuid FROM DUAL
INSERT INTO YAGL_DWJZXX_JZL(uuid,jzid,jzqk,jzsyxz,jzjg,gnms,zdmj,jzmj,dsgd,dxgd,dscs,dxcs,delete_flag,datasource,jdh,sjc,reserve1,reserve2,reserve3,reserve4) VALUES(#{jzl_uuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{jzl_jzid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{jzl_jzqk,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{jzl_jzsyxz,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{jzl_jzjg,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{jzl_gnms,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{jzl_zdmj,jdbcType=DOUBLE},#{jzl_jzmj,jdbcType=DOUBLE},#{jzl_dsgd,jdbcType=DOUBLE},#{jzl_dxgd,jdbcType=DOUBLE},#{jzl_dscs,jdbcType=DOUBLE},#{jzl_dxcs,jdbcType=DOUBLE},'N',#{jzl_datasource,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{jzl_jdh,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{jzl_sjc,jdbcType=DATE},#{jzl_reserve1,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{jzl_reserve2,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{jzl_reserve3,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{jzl_reserve4,jdbcType=DATE})

SELECT SYS_GUID() AS zzl_uuid FROM DUAL
INSERT INTO YAGL_DWJZXX_ZZL(uuid,jzid,jzjg,zdmj,zzgd,zzzc,jsfzr,jsfzrdh,ylxx,cwxx,gylc,delete_flag,datasource,jdh,sjc,reserve1,reserve2,reserve3,reserve4) VALUES(#{zzl_uuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{zzl_jzid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{zzl_jzjg,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{zzl_zdmj,jdbcType=DOUBLE},#{zzl_zzgd,jdbcType=DOUBLE},#{zzl_zzzc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{zzl_jsfzr,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{zzl_jsfzrdh,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{zzl_ylxx,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{zzl_cwxx,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{zzl_gylc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'N',#{zzl_datasource,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{zzl_jdh,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{zzl_sjc,jdbcType=DATE},#{zzl_reserve1,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{zzl_reserve2,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{zzl_reserve3,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{zzl_reserve4,jdbcType=DATE})

SELECT SYS_GUID() AS cgl_uuid FROM DUAL
INSERT INTO YAGL_DWJZXX_CGL(uuid,jzid,zrj,cgsl,cgjg,ccjzms,jsfzr,jsfzrdh,plqkd,plqkn,plqkx,plqkb,delete_flag,datasource,jdh,sjc,reserve1,reserve2,reserve3,reserve4) VALUES(#{cgl_uuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{cgl_jzid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{cgl_zrj,jdbcType=DOUBLE},#{cgl_cgsl,jdbcType=DOUBLE},#{cgl_cgjg,jdbcType=DOUBLE},#{cgl_ccjzms,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{cgl_jsfzr,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{cgl_jsfzrdh,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{cgl_plqkd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{cgl_plqkn,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{cgl_plqkx,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{cgl_plqkb,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'N',#{cgl_datasource,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{cgl_jdh,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{cgl_sjc,jdbcType=DATE},#{cgl_reserve1,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{cgl_reserve2,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{cgl_reserve3,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{cgl_reserve4,jdbcType=DATE})

SELECT SYS_GUID() AS uuid FROM DUAL
INSERT INTO YAGL_JZBW_CGL_CG(uuid,sjlx,pkid,cgmc,cglx,cgrl,cgzj,cggd,cgzc,gdmj,gzyl,ccwd,ccjzmc,ccjzlhxz,ccjzsjcl,ccjzywgd,bz,delete_flag,datasource,jdh,sjc,reserve1,reserve2,reserve3,reserve4) VALUES(#{uuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{sjlx,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{pkid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{cgmc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{cglx,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{cgrl,jdbcType=DOUBLE},#{cgzj,jdbcType=DOUBLE},#{cggd,jdbcType=DOUBLE},#{cgzc,jdbcType=DOUBLE},#{gdmj,jdbcType=DOUBLE},#{gzyl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{ccwd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{ccjzmc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{ccjzlhxz,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{ccjzsjcl,jdbcType=DOUBLE},#{ccjzywgd,jdbcType=DOUBLE},#{bz,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'N',#{datasource,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{jdh,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{sjc,jdbcType=DATE},#{reserve1,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{reserve2,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{reserve3,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{reserve4,jdbcType=DATE})
mapper.update: UPDATE YAGL_DWJZXX t SET t.DELETE_FLAG = 'Y' WHERE 1=1 AND t.JZID = #{value}
UPDATE YAGL_DWJZXX_JZL t SET t.DELETE_FLAG = 'Y' WHERE 1=1 AND t.JZID = #{value}
UPDATE YAGL_DWJZXX_ZZL t SET t.DELETE_FLAG = 'Y' WHERE 1=1 AND t.JZID = #{value}
UPDATE YAGL_DWJZXX_CGL t SET t.DELETE_FLAG = 'Y' WHERE 1=1 AND t.JZID = #{value}
UPDATE YAGL_JZBW_CGL_CG t SET t.DELETE_FLAG = 'Y' WHERE 1 = 1 and t.pkid in (select uuid from YAGL_DWJZXX_CGL where jzid = #{value})
UPDATE YAGL_JZBW_CGL_CG t SET t.DELETE_FLAG = 'Y' WHERE 1 = 1 AND t.UUID = #{uuid}

UPDATE YAGL_DWJZXX
jzmc=#{jzmc}, jzlx=#{jzlx}, jzwz=#{jzwz}, lon=#{lon}, lat=#{lat}, xqxclx=#{xqxclx}, yjddsc=#{yjddsc}, delete_flag=#{deleteFlag}, datasource=#{datasource}, bz=#{bz},
sjc=TO_DATE(#{sjc},'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss'), reserve1=#{reserve1}, reserve2=#{reserve2}, reserve3=#{reserve3}, reserve4=TO_DATE(#{reserve4},'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss'),
xgrid=#{xgrid}, xgrmc=#{xgrmc}, xgsj=sysdate
WHERE JZID = #{jzid}

UPDATE YAGL_DWJZXX_JZL
jzqk=#{jzl_jzqk}, jzsyxz=#{jzl_jzsyxz}, jzjg=#{jzl_jzjg}, gnms=#{jzl_gnms}, zdmj=#{jzl_zdmj}, dsgd=#{jzl_dsgd}, dxgd=#{jzl_dxgd}, dscs=#{jzl_dscs},
delete_flag=#{jzl_deleteFlag}, datasource=#{jzl_datasource}, sjc=TO_DATE(#{jzl_sjc},'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss'), reserve1=#{jzl_reserve1}, reserve2=#{jzl_reserve2}, reserve3=#{jzl_reserve3}, reserve4=TO_DATE(#{jzl_reserve4},'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss')
WHERE JZID = #{jzl_jzid}

UPDATE YAGL_DWJZXX_ZZL
jzjg=#{zzl_jzjg}, zdmj=#{zzl_zdmj}, zzgd=#{zzl_zzgd}, jsfzr=#{zzl_jsfzr}, jsfzrdh=#{zzl_jsfzrdh}, zzzc=#{zzl_zzzc}, ylxx=#{zzl_ylxx}, cwxx=#{zzl_cwxx}, gylc=#{zzl_gylc},
delete_flag=#{zzl_deleteFlag}, datasource=#{zzl_datasource}, sjc=TO_DATE(#{zzl_sjc},'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss'), reserve1=#{zzl_reserve1}, reserve2=#{zzl_reserve2}, reserve3=#{zzl_reserve3}, reserve4=TO_DATE(#{zzl_reserve4},'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss')
WHERE JZID = #{zzl_jzid}

UPDATE YAGL_DWJZXX_CGL
zrj=#{cgl_zrj}, cgsl=#{cgl_cgsl}, cgjg=#{cgl_cgjg}, ccjzms=#{cgl_ccjzms}, jsfzr=#{cgl_jsfzr}, jsfzrdh=#{cgl_jsfzrdh}, plqkd=#{cgl_plqkd}, plqkx=#{cgl_plqkx}, plqkn=#{cgl_plqkn}, plqkb=#{cgl_plqkb},
delete_flag=#{cgl_deleteFlag}, datasource=#{cgl_datasource}, sjc=TO_DATE(#{cgl_sjc},'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss'), reserve1=#{cgl_reserve1}, reserve2=#{cgl_reserve2}, reserve3=#{cgl_reserve3}, reserve4=TO_DATE(#{cgl_reserve4},'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss')
WHERE JZID = #{cgl_jzid}

UPDATE YAGL_JZBW_CGL_CG
cgmc=#{cgmc}, cglx=#{cglx}, cgrl=#{cgrl}, cgzj=#{cgzj}, cggd=#{cggd}, cgzc=#{cgzc}, gdmj=#{gdmj}, gzyl=#{gzyl}, ccwd=#{ccwd}, ccjzmc=#{ccjzmc}, ccjzlhxz=#{ccjzlhxz}, ccjzsjcl=#{ccjzsjcl}, ccjzywgd=#{ccjzywgd}, bz=#{bz},
delete_flag=#{deleteFlag}, datasource=#{datasource}, sjc=TO_DATE(#{sjc},'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss'), reserve1=#{reserve1}, reserve2=#{reserve2}, reserve3=#{reserve3}, reserve4=TO_DATE(#{reserve4},'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss')
WHERE UUID = #{uuid}

INSERT INTO YAGL_DWJZXX(jzid,jzmc,jzlx,jzwz,lon,lat,xqxclx,yjddsc,delete_flag,datasource,bz,jdh,sjc,reserve1,reserve2,reserve3,reserve4) VALUES
#{item.jzid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} jzid,#{item.jzmc,jdbcType=VARCHAR} jzmc,#{item.jzlx,jdbcType=VARCHAR} jzlx,#{item.jzwz,jdbcType=VARCHAR} jzwz,#{item.lon,jdbcType=DOUBLE} lon,#{item.lat,jdbcType=DOUBLE} lat,#{item.xqxclx,jdbcType=VARCHAR} xqxclx,#{item.yjddsc,jdbcType=DOUBLE} yjddsc,'N' delete_flag,#{item.datasource,jdbcType=VARCHAR} datasource,#{item.bz,jdbcType=VARCHAR} bz,#{item.jdh,jdbcType=VARCHAR} jdh,#{item.sjc,jdbcType=DATE} sjc,#{item.reserve1,jdbcType=VARCHAR} reserve1,#{item.reserve2,jdbcType=VARCHAR} reserve2,#{item.reserve3,jdbcType=VARCHAR} reserve3,#{item.reserve4,jdbcType=DATE} reserve4
ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE jzid = VALUES(jzid), jzmc = VALUES(jzmc), jzlx = VALUES(jzlx), jzwz = VALUES(jzwz), lon = VALUES(lon), lat = VALUES(lat), xqxclx = VALUES(xqxclx), yjddsc = VALUES(yjddsc), delete_flag = VALUES(delete_flag), datasource = VALUES(datasource), bz = VALUES(bz), jdh = VALUES(jdh), sjc = VALUES(sjc), reserve1 = VALUES(reserve1), reserve2 = VALUES(reserve2), reserve3 = VALUES(reserve3), reserve4 = VALUES(reserve4), cjrid = VALUES(cjrid), cjrmc = VALUES(cjrmc), cjsj = VALUES(cjsj), xgrid = VALUES(xgrid), xgrmc = VALUES(xgrmc), xgsj = VALUES(xgsj)
mapper.select:
SELECT , c2.code_name jzlxmc FROM YAGL_DWJZXX t
Left Join SYS_CODELIST c1 on c1.CODETYPE = 'JZLX' And c1.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' Left Join SYS_CODELIST_DETAIL c2 On c1.CODEID = c2.CODEID And c2.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' and t.jzlx = c2.CODE_VALUE WHERE t.DELETE_FLAG = 'N'

SELECT , c2.code_name jzlxmc, , c4.code_name jzl_jzqkmc, c6.code_name jzl_jzsyxzmc, c8.code_name jzl_jzjgmc FROM YAGL_DWJZXX t LEFT JOIN YAGL_DWJZXX_JZL t_jzl ON t.jzid = t_jzl.jzid AND t_jzl.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' Left Join SYS_CODELIST c1 on c1.CODETYPE = 'JZLX' And c1.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' Left Join SYS_CODELIST_DETAIL c2 On c2.CODEID = c1.CODEID And c2.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' and t.jzlx = c2.CODE_VALUE Left Join SYS_CODELIST c3 on c3.CODETYPE = 'JZLX' And c3.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' Left Join SYS_CODELIST_DETAIL c4 On c4.CODEID = c3.CODEID And c4.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' and t_jzl.jzqk = c4. CODE_VALUE Left Join SYS_CODELIST c5 on c5.CODETYPE = 'JZSYXZ' And c5.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' Left Join SYS_CODELIST_DETAIL c6 On c6.CODEID = c5.CODEID And c6.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' and t_jzl.jzsyxz = c6. CODE_VALUE Left Join SYS_CODELIST c7 on c7.CODETYPE = 'JZJG' And c7.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' Left Join SYS_CODELIST_DETAIL c8 On c8.CODEID = c7.CODEID And c8.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' and t_jzl.jzjg = c8 .CODE_VALUE WHERE t.DELETE_FLAG = 'N'

SELECT , c2.code_name jzlxmc, , c4.code_name zzl_jzjgmc FROM YAGL_DWJZXX t LEFT JOIN YAGL_DWJZXX_ZZL t_zzl ON t.jzid = t_zzl.jzid AND t_zzl.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' Left Join SYS_CODELIST c1 on c1.CODETYPE = 'JZLX' And c1.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' Left Join SYS_CODELIST_DETAIL c2 On c2.CODEID = c1.CODEID And c2.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' and t.jzlx = c2.CODE_VALUE Left Join SYS_CODELIST c3 on c3.CODETYPE = 'JZJG' And c3.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' Left Join SYS_CODELIST_DETAIL c4 On c4.CODEID = c3.CODEID And c4.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' and t_zzl.jzjg = c4. CODE_VALUE WHERE t.DELETE_FLAG = 'N'

SELECT , c2.code_name jzlxmc,
FROM YAGL_DWJZXX t LEFT JOIN YAGL_DWJZXX_CGL t_cgl ON t.jzid = t_cgl.jzid AND t_cgl.DELETE_FLAG = 'N'
Left Join SYS_CODELIST c1 on c1.CODETYPE = 'JZLX' And c1.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' Left Join SYS_CODELIST_DETAIL c2 On c2.CODEID = c1.CODEID And c2.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' and t.jzlx = c2.CODE_VALUE WHERE t.DELETE_FLAG = 'N'

SELECT t.uuid uuid, t.bwid bwid, t.jzmc jzmc, to_char(t.jzsjcl,'fm9999999990.00') jzsjcl, t.jzlhtx jzlhtx, t.jzbz jzbz, t.delete_flag deleteFlag, t.datasource datasource, t.jdh jdh, TO_CHAR(t.sjc,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss') sjc, t.reserve1 reserve1, t.reserve2 reserve2, t.reserve3 reserve3, TO_CHAR(t.reserve4,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss') reserve4 FROM YAGL_ZDBW_JZL_WXJZ t WHERE t.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' and t.bwid = #{bwid}

SELECT t.uuid uuid, t.sjlx sjlx, t.pkid pkid, t.cgmc cgmc, t.cglx cglx, t.cgrl cgrl, t.cgzj cgzj, t.cggd cggd, t.cgzc cgzc, t.gdmj gdmj, t.gzyl gzyl, t.ccwd ccwd, t.ccjzmc ccjzmc, t.ccjzlhxz ccjzlhxz, t.ccjzsjcl ccjzsjcl, t.ccjzywgd ccjzywgd, t.delete_flag deleteFlag, t.datasource datasource, t.bz bz, t.jdh jdh, TO_CHAR(t.sjc,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss') sjc, t.reserve1 reserve1, t.reserve2 reserve2, t.reserve3 reserve3, TO_CHAR(t.reserve4,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss') reserve4, c2.code_name cglxmc FROM YAGL_JZBW_CGL_CG t
Left Join SYS_CODELIST c1 on c1.CODETYPE = 'CGLX' And c1.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' Left Join SYS_CODELIST_DETAIL c2 On c1.CODEID = c2.CODEID And c2.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' and t.cglx = c2.CODE_VALUE WHERE t.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' and t.pkid = #{pkid}
SELECT t.JZID,t2.JZLX FROM YAGL_DX_ZDDW_JZFQ t LEFT JOIN YAGL_DWJZXX t2 ON t.JZID=t2.JZID AND t2.DELETE_FLAG='N' WHERE t.ZDDWID = #{value}

SELECT , c2.code_name jzlxmc FROM YAGL_DX_ZDDW_JZFQ z,YAGL_DWJZXX t
Left Join SYS_CODELIST c1 on c1.CODETYPE = 'JZLX' And c1.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' Left Join SYS_CODELIST_DETAIL c2 On c1.CODEID = c2.CODEID And c2.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' and t.jzlx = c2.CODE_VALUE WHERE t.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' and z.jzid = t.jzid and z.zddwid = #{zddwid}
